name: Next.js Route Range Requests (206)
description: Serve partial content using Range header with 206 responses.

files.template: export async function GET(req: Request){ const text = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'; const total = text.length; const hdr = new Headers(req.headers).get('range'); if(!hdr){ return new Response(text, { headers:{ 'content-length': String(total), 'accept-ranges':'bytes' } }); } const m = /bytes=(\d+)-(\d+)?/.exec(hdr||''); if(!m) return new Response('bad range', { status: 416 }); const start = Number(m[1]); const end = m[2] ? Number(m[2]) : total-1; const body = text.slice(start, end+1); return new Response(body, { status: 206, headers:{ 'content-range': `bytes ${start}-${end}/${total}`, 'content-length': String(body.length), 'accept-ranges':'bytes' } }); }
